title: Verizon Issue Fixed or still broken??
body: I was having the same ping issue as a lot of people here where out of nowhere my ping went from 35 to 140 and stayed at 140 consistently ever since Saturday. In order to try and not get a penalty, I would use practice tool to check my ping. As of now, my ping is at its normal state in practice tool which led me to believe it may be fixed. However I have not actually gone into a pvp match yet because im still worried it might spike out of nowhere again. Is anyone else's ping normal now or is it just me?

replies.body:
Looks like we're still seeing a lot of Verizon issues =(. I've been using this to stay on top of it myself, could be useful for you guys as well!

http://downdetector.com/status/verizon/map/
Worked good in practice tool. About to find out in game...
I am in a ranked game, the ping is back to as it is for now.
Same exact thing has been happening to me, it always looks good then jumps to shit when you start an actual game vs people, don't fall for Verizon's bait
